about_the_game:
Warning: Contains Spoilers for the main game!

The Official Artbook for Sense: A Cyberpunk Ghost Story is a 51 page companion artbook which contains high resolution original artwork of environments, characters, props, and the world of Sense, including small commentaries on the game's design and world. With art by the game's main artist and project lead, Benjamin Widdowson, this artbook is the perfect companion for hardcore fans of the game who are curious about the game's art.

Explore everything from the cyberpunk-meets-eastern environments throughout the game to Benjamin's striking character and NPC designs and concepts to the horrifying designs of the ghosts - and their counterparts - which appear throughout the game. A must have for anyone itching for more of the world of Sense!

content_descriptors.notes: Features art which includes partial nudity (revealing outfits), as well as high-res art of visuals some may consider scary or horrific, including blood and gore.
